q: Moreover, says Slezak, Simon Cowell was someone who could deliver" succinct, brutally honest and witty" critiques in an off-the-cuff fashion." Simon Cowell was the voice of the people," he says. He had a very specific skill that not everyone can pull off. Even Ellen DeGeneres , who has been an Oscar host couldn't do it_ and that was a shock to me. Indiana Rep. Mike Pence will not run for president in 2012, the Indianapolis Star reported Thursday. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, the 51-year-old GOP congressman wrote in a letter to supporters.
